subtests.name: # AUDIT TASK RUNNER STARTED.
> [basic] Old-style constructor
new OfflineAudioContext(3) threw TypeError: "Argument not optional".
new OfflineAudioContext(3, 42) threw TypeError: "Argument not optional".
context = new OfflineAudioContext(3, 42, 12345) did not throw an exception.
context.length is equal to 42.
context.sampleRate is equal to 12345.
X context.destination.channelCount is not equal to 3. Got 2.
X context.destination.channelCountMode is not equal to explicit. Got max.
context.destination.channelInterpretation is equal to speakers.
< [basic] 2 out of 8 assertions were failed.
> [options-1] Required options
new OfflineAudioContext() threw TypeError: "Argument not optional".
new OfflineAudioContext({}) threw TypeError: "Argument not optional".
new OfflineAudioContext({"length":42}) threw TypeError: "Argument not optional".
new OfflineAudioContext({"sampleRate":12345}) threw TypeError: "Argument not optional".
X c2 = new OfflineAudioContext({"length":42,"sampleRate":12345}) incorrectly threw TypeError: "Argument not optional".
Executing "options-1"
< [options-1] 1 out of 5 assertions were failed.
> [options-2] Invalid options
X new OfflineAudioContext({"length":42,"sampleRate":8000,"numberOfChannels":33}) threw "TypeError" instead of NotSupportedError.
X new OfflineAudioContext({"length":0,"sampleRate":8000}) threw "TypeError" instead of NotSupportedError.
X new OfflineAudioContext({"length":1,"sampleRate":1}) threw "TypeError" instead of NotSupportedError.
< [options-2] 3 out of 3 assertions were failed.
> [options-3] Valid options
X c = new OfflineAudioContext{"length":1,"sampleRate":8000}) incorrectly threw TypeError: "Argument not optional".
Executing "options-3"
< [options-3] 1 out of 1 assertions were failed.
# AUDIT TASK RUNNER FINISHED: 4 out of 4 tasks were failed.
